CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.6)


SET(SRC  iio.c            iio.h           libraryBasic.cpp libraryBasic.h )

#set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -O3 -std=c99 -funroll-loops -Wno-unused -DNDEBUG")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -std=c99 ")

# debug
#set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -g -O0 ")


ADD_LIBRARY(library2013 ${SRC})

FIND_PACKAGE(JPEG)
FIND_PACKAGE(TIFF)
FIND_PACKAGE(PNG)

ADD_DEFINITIONS(${PNG_DEFINITIONS})

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${TIFF_INCLUDE_DIR})
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${PNG_INCLUDE_DIR})
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${JPEG_INCLUDE_DIR})
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(..)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(library2013 ${TIFF_LIBRARIES} ${PNG_LIBRARIES} ${JPEG_LIBRARIES} )
